name: nativescript-image-filters
description: NativeScript plugin to easily apply filters to your pictures.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-image-filters && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
